Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)

Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Agiscono con una sorta di orrido lavoro di squadra." —Generale Tazri, comandante alleata

L'Aggressore Eldrazi ha rapidità fintanto che controlli un'altra creatura incolore.

name: Eldrazi Aggressor
originalText:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Eldrazi Aggressor has haste as long as you control another colorless creature.

rulings.text: If it’s the turn Eldrazi Aggressor comes under your control, and it loses haste after being declared as an attacker, it will continue to attack. It won’t be removed from combat.
